entry.title: Ladakh tour Package (6 Nights, 7 Days)
entry.summary:
Vendor: LandLife Tour & Travels
Type:
Price: 18000.00

Embark on an unforgettable Ladakh adventure with our exclusive tour package. Explore the pristine beauty of the Himalayas, pristine lakes, and ancient monasteries. Our all-inclusive package ensures a hassle-free experience with comfortable accommodations, expert guides, and seamless transportation. Book your Ladakh tour today and make memories that last a lifetime.

Package will also include :

  • Dinner and Breakfast
  • Hotel Accommodation
  • Personal cab for visiting places
  • One hour shikara ride in Dal Lake
  • All toll taxes.
